name: @ffk/onboarding
description: Fleet of the Faithful Knights Data Onboarding and Ingestion Server

scripts.build-dev-watch: concurrently " npm run build-watch " " npm run start-dev "
scripts.deploy: ssh $USER@4.71.159.157 'docker stop onboarding | docker rm onboarding | docker run -d --name onboarding -p 8008:8008 -e FFK_DISCORD_PANEL_BOT_TOKEN=$FFK_DISCORD_PANEL_BOT_TOKEN -e FFK_API_TOKEN=$FFK_API_TOKEN -e FFK_API_ADDRESS=$FFK_API_ADDRESS cloud.canister.io:5000/928779879786/onboarding'
scripts.update: ssh $USER@4.71.159.157 'docker pull cloud.canister.io:5000/928779879786/api | docker commit panel panel:latest'
scripts.release-cold: npm run docker-build && npm run docker-push && npm run deploy
scripts.release-hot: npm run docker-build && npm run docker-push && npm run update

author: kashw2 <supra4keanu@hotmail.com>
